name: Bearsden Primary - ZX Spectrum Games - Coded by 10/11 year olds - 2022 Edition
name_original: Bearsden Primary - ZX Spectrum Games - Coded by 10/11 year olds - 2022 Edition
description:
Primary 6 pupils at Bearsden Primary school (Aged 10/11)  have been working incredibly hard to code games for the ZX Spectrum using Jonathan Cauldwell's AGD (Arcade Game Designer)

They have learned so much about basic coding along with debugging, animation and level design.

They would love Spectrum and gaming enthusiasts to play their games and see what they have created.

It would be incredible if we could get some support from the retro gaming community.

The games are in .tap format and can be played in the usual ways, on your favourite emulator or you can simply Google Torinak, open any game and drag and drop the downloaded file into the screen for instant online/in-browser play.

Thanks for taking the time to read this and please download the games if you get the chance.

Instructions for playing online:

The games are in .tap format and can be played in the usual ways, on your favourite emulator or you can simply Google Torinak, open any game and drag and drop the downloaded file into the screen for instant online/in-browser play.

Any games with a loading screen require you to press enter twice to start the game. (This was a rather crude work-around to avoid having to make custom loaders 👍😁)
